item.description:
Join us for an evening of poetry and music. Mitra Louise Tuski will examine the life and work of poet, Emily Dickinson, making connections to many Buddhist ideas and principles and guest artist, Ian Tuski will play classical guitar, giving us the opportunity to experience:

Music heard so deeply
That it is not heard at all,
But you are the music
While the music lasts.
T.S. Eliot

Door opens at 6:45 pm, meditation at 7 and the evening ends at 9 PM.

All welcome.

Cost: By donation
item.name: At Nagaloka Buddhist Center for an evening of poetry and music
